title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the pasta until al dente.
Beat eggs and mix with cheese.
Combine pasta with pancetta and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a buttery tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt.
Add cream and chicken to the sauce.
